name: Kawaii Future Bass
description: "Cute" style of Future Bass rooted in anime and video game culture; emerged in Japan in the mid-2010s.

children.name: Future Core
children.description: Blends the speed, basslines, and rhythms of UK Hardcore (mostly coming from the J-core sphere) with euphoric, woozy synths, 7th chords and arpeggios, and vocal chops of Future Bass, particularly Kawaii Future Bass.
